name: jsos
description: JavaScript Operating System - TypeScript to bare metal

scripts.info: echo "JSOS - JavaScript Operating System" && echo "====================================" && echo "" && echo "Available commands:" && echo "  npm run build           - Build the OS ISO" && echo "  npm run test            - Test in QEMU (automated)" && echo "  npm run test:interactive - Test in QEMU (interactive)" && echo "  npm run dev             - Build and test (development)" && echo "  npm run clean           - Clean build artifacts" && echo "  npm run docker:build    - Build Docker images" && echo "" && echo "Requirements: Docker and npm"
scripts.build: docker rm -f temp-jsos 2>nul & docker build -f docker/build.Dockerfile -t jsos-build . && docker create --name temp-jsos jsos-build /bin/true && if exist build\jsos.iso del /f build\jsos.iso && docker cp temp-jsos:/jsos.iso build/jsos.iso && docker rm temp-jsos
scripts.build:local: npm run build:ts && npm run embed:js && echo "TypeScript build complete"
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run test
scripts.clean:local: if exist build rmdir /s /q build 2>nul || rm -rf build/ 2>/dev/null || true

author: JSOS Developer
